body_html:
Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04

For CUDA:
ls /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcud*
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so.7.5 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so.7.5.18

For Tensorflow (from source):

git rev-parse HEAD
3d35376

For bazel version:

Build label: 0.3.1
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Fri Jul 29 09:09:52 2016 (1469783392)
Build timestamp: 1469783392
Build timestamp as int: 1469783392

All other info is on the first 2 threads.

How to reproduce:

Try ImageNet dataset, I use only 269 classes of total 1000.
Model: Inception V1 (slim).
--max_number_of_steps=60435
--batch_size=256
--save_interval_secs=1200
--save_summaries_secs=1200
Hardware: 4 Tian X GPU, with each has 12GB memery

body:
Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04

For CUDA:
ls /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcud*
**/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudadevrt.a  /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so.7.5     /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart_static.a
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so    /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.so.7.5.18**

For Tensorflow (from source):

git rev-parse HEAD
3d35376a66cde4f3e614c746d3c8708d15caa1b5

For bazel version: 

**Build label: 0.3.1
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Fri Jul 29 09:09:52 2016 (1469783392)
Build timestamp: 1469783392
Build timestamp as int: 1469783392**

---

All other info is on the first 2 threads.

How to reproduce:

Try ImageNet dataset, I use only 269 classes of total 1000. 
Model: Inception V1 (slim). 
**--max_number_of_steps=60435
--batch_size=256
--save_interval_secs=1200 
--save_summaries_secs=1200** 
Hardware: 4 Tian X GPU, with each has 12GB memery
